publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4058 Peter Peacock: Scottish Executive's Nominations to the European Economic and Social Committee—That the Parliament notes with regret the resignation of Professor Robert Grant Baird from the United Kingdom delegation to the European Union’s Economic and Social Committee and endorses the Scottish Executive proposal to nominate Mr Brendan Burns, Dr Grahame Wright and Mr Anthony Tucker to the delegation to the committee. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*
